name: Gdevelop P2P exemple
description:
The simple platformer exemple from Gdevelop but add with that a custom way to play online.

No copyright you can do what you want. But please if you use it tell others about this so we can grow the gdevelop knowledge

How to play?

- You'll need two tabs open (one could be your friend computers)

-copy your Id and paste it on the other tab

after click play and here  is a normal platformer but with the online activated
